mean_cn: adj. 字面上的；照字面的；非比喻的；缺乏想像力的；求实的；实实在在的；文学的
mean_en: involving the ordinary or usual meaning of a word
word_etyma: liter文字,字母+al形容词后缀 → 文字上的，字面上的
short_phrase: a literal translation of a document
sentence: In contracts all word meanings are literal, whereas in literature they can be figurative.
sentence_trans: 合同中所有文字都是字面意思，然而在文学中它们可能有比喻意义。
